meanings.definition: In a way that is excessively modest or self-deprecating.
meanings.sent1: She spoke overmodestly about her achievements, downplaying her hard work.
meanings.sent2: He overmodestly refused to accept any praise for his excellent performance.
meanings.sent3: Even though she knew she did well, she overmodestly claimed it was just luck.
meanings.sent4: His overmodestly humble attitude made him stand out among the boastful crowd.
meanings.sent5: The way she overmodestly dismissed her talents was truly admirable.
